name: Employee Attendance Cancelled Penalty
query:
SELECT
    ep.name AS "ID:Link/Employee Penalty:120",
    ep.employee AS "Employee:Link/Employee:150",
    e.employee_name AS "Employee Name:Data:200",
    ep.penalty_date AS "Penalty Date:Date:120",
    epd.leave_type AS "Leave Type:Link/Leave Type:150",
    epd.leave_amount AS "Leave Amount",
    epd.reason AS "Reason:Data:200",
    ep.attendance AS "Attendance:Link/Attendance:150",
    at.in_time AS "Check-In:Datetime:180",
    at.out_time AS "Check-Out:Datetime:180"
FROM `tabEmployee Penalty` ep
LEFT JOIN `tabEmployee Leave Penalty Details` epd 
       ON epd.parent = ep.name
LEFT JOIN `tabAttendance` at 
       ON at.name = ep.attendance
LEFT JOIN `tabEmployee` e 
       ON e.name = ep.employee
where ep.is_leave_balance_restore = 1
ORDER BY ep.penalty_date DESC, ep.name, epd.idx;
